task.title: Changing the Icons in a WebHelp Table of Contents

context.p: To assign different icons use the following procedure:

step.cmd: Create a custom CSS file that assigns your desired icons to the .hasSubMenuClosed and .hasSubMenuOpened properties.
It is recommended that you store the image files in the same directory as the default icons: [OXYGEN_INSTALL_DIR]\frameworks\dita\DITA-OT\plugins\com.oxygenxml.webhelp\oxygen-webhelp\resources\img\.

Edit the WebHelp transformation scenario and in the Parameters tab assign the path of your custom CSS file to be the value of the following parameter: args.css for DITA transformations or html.stylesheet for DocBook transformations.
